price: Kuwaleta wengine badala yenu na kukuumbeni nyinyi kwa umbo msilo lijua.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Na wala Sisi si wenye kushindwa kukubadilisheni sura zenu, na kuzileta nyengine, na tukakuumbeni katika umbo jengine na sura nyengine msiyo ijua.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila amthālakum wanunshi-akum fī mā lā taʿlamūna
